headers.subject: [tosdr:2596] Stack Exchange notifies you when they collect/share sensitive info

html:
It’s hard to imagine that we would ever consider collecting, let alone sharing, sensitive information with a non-agent third party, but if such a day should come, we will first give you the opportunity to explicitly consent (opt-in) to such disclosure or to any use of the information for a purpose other than the one for which it was originally collected or previously authorized.

http://stackexchange.com/legal/privacy-policy

Title: Stack Exchange notifies you when they collect and/or share sensitive info

Topic: personal-data

Summary: If Stack Exchange collects or shares sensitive information with third parties, they first notify you and give you the opportunity to explicitly consent to such disclosure.

Score: 150 (good) 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Stack Exchange notifies you when they collect/share sensitive info
text:
>
> It’s hard to imagine that we would ever consider collecting, let alone 
> sharing, sensitive information with a non-agent<http://stackexchange.com/legal/privacy-policy#agents> third 
> party, but if such a day should come, we will first give you the 
> opportunity to explicitly consent (opt-in) to such disclosure or to any use 
> of the information for a purpose other than the one for which it was 
> originally collected or previously authorized.


http://stackexchange.com/legal/privacy-policy

Title: Stack Exchange notifies you when they collect and/or share sensitive 
info

Topic: personal-data

Summary: If Stack Exchange collects or shares sensitive information with 
third parties, they first notify you and give you the opportunity to 
explicitly consent to such disclosure.

Score: 150 (good)
